trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> para que seja possível usar o padrão “ouvinte de eventos fraco” para anexar ouvintes ao evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to use this class, see "Using an Existing Weak Event Manager Class" in[Weak Event Patterns](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/weak-event-patterns.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como usar essa classe, consulte "Usando um existente fraca Gerenciador de classe de evento" em[fraca padrões de evento](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/weak-event-patterns.md).

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que gera o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified delegate as an event handler of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o delegado especificado como um manipulador de eventos de origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The source for events being listened to.
trans-unit.target: A origem de eventos que está sendo ouvida.

trans-unit.source: The data to check.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem verificados.

trans-unit.source: This object is expected to be a <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Espera-se que este objeto seja uma implementação de <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to stop listening to <c>source</c>, and completely remove all entries from <c>data</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para interromper a escuta da <c>origem</c> e remover completamente todas as entradas de <c>dados</c>.

trans-unit.source: Removes inactive listener entries from the data list for the provided source.
trans-unit.target: Remove entradas do ouvinte inativo da lista de dados para a origem fornecida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if some entries were actually removed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se algumas entradas foram removidas, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que gera o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que manipula o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o manipulador de eventos especificado da fonte especificada.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="handler" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handler" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" /> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Começa a escutar o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" /> na origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The source object to stop listening for.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem para o qual interromper a escuta.

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" /> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Para de escutar o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged" /> na origem especificada.
